de.ovgu.featureide.ui.actions.generator

Class ConfigurationBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ovgu.featureide.ui.actions.generator.ConfigurationBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IConfigurationBuilderBasics

    public class ConfigurationBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements IConfigurationBuilderBasics
    Builds all valid or current configurations for a selected feature project.
    Author:
    Jens Meinicke

      • featureProject

        public de.ovgu.featureide.core.IFeatureProject featureProject

      • configurationNumber

        public long configurationNumber
        The count of valid configurations.
        This is generated by the sat-solver or the amount current configurations at the configurations folder.

      • counting

        public boolean counting
        A flag that indicates that the counting Job is running or has finished.

      • ConfigurationBuilder

                            boolean createNewProjects,
                            java.lang.String algorithm,
                            int t,
                            IConfigurationBuilderBasics.BuildOrder buildOrder,
                            boolean runTests,
                            int max,
                            int tOrder)
        Parameters:
        featureProject - The feature project
        buildType - true if all possible valid configurations should be build
        false if all current configurations should be build
        createNewProjects - true if the configurations should be built into separate projects
        algorithm - selected algorithmen
        t - t
        buildOrder - build order
        runTests - whether the tests should be run after the operation
        max - Maximal number of configurations to generate.
        tOrder - tOrder
